name: 外滩
address: 上海市黄浦区中山东一路
description: 外滩是上海市中心的一个区域，由一段沿黄浦江的河岸组成，为上海重要的地标之一。
description_en: The Bund is a waterfront area in central Shanghai. The area centers on a section of Zhongshan Road within the former Shanghai International Settlement, which runs along the western bank of the Huangpu River in the eastern part of Huangpu District.
